title: Jeffrey Barros Peña
summary: I am a determined recent graduate who is passionate about the field of computer science and the development of software that betters the lives of its users. I look forward to excelling past the boundaries of my academic experience to continue learning about new technology stacks that make up the business world we live in.

projects.title: Juke Jam
projects.description: An iOS app that allows users to accept and add song recommendations to playlists in real time. Ideal for event hosts.

projects.title: Peer Text Transfer
projects.description: Program to transfer text files using UDP & FTP

projects.title: Tip Request iOS
projects.description: A utility iOS app that allows users to save past food purchases locally and calculate a tip amount based on percentage.

projects.title: Tip Request Android
projects.description: The Android equivalent of Tip Request iOS but with added features. With the integrated Google sign-in, you can view your history of past transactions across different devices. The history is all saved with Google Firebase. Quick Tip is where you can calculate tips on the go and subsequently add them to your history of past transactions if you please. The ability to search for dining establishments using the Google Maps API gives user the ability to save spots and view them on a map.

projects.title: Spots Journal
projects.description: An iOS app designed to allow users to save locations with respective journal entries (still in development)
